In the event that the person saw that hair was falling out of the comb This may indicate the great effort made by the dreamer at that time. In the event that a person sees hair falling out of the comb, this may indicate that debts were paid off with great difficulty in those days, thanks to God. In the event that a person sees his hair falling out of The comb, this indicates some disagreements and problems in his life at that time, and God knows best. If a person sees that he is carrying a comb and it falls, this may indicate He indicated that he suffered severe pain in his life at that time. Seeing a comb falling in a dream may indicate a loss of rights and judgments that the dreamer may be exposed to, and God knows best. A dream about cleaning the comb from the hair may indicate the release of worries and pains that the dreamer has suffered from for a period of time, and God knows best. Seeing the teeth of a comb falling out in a dream may indicate the loss of dreams and ambitions for the dreamer and he must seek God’s help. title: Interpretation of dreams about losing and finding identity in a dream

preview.html: To see the loss of an ID card in a dream shows fear of the unknown future and other interpretations that we will explain to single, married, pregnant, and divorced people, such as losing personal identity and identity theft. Card or finding the lost personal card according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others Below the thread: Interpretation of losing one’s identity in a dream - which Losing one’s personal card in a dream is a sign of fear of the future, or rather fear of the unknown and failure, and a person who constantly sees the loss of his or her identity in a dream may He is a person who does not trust those around him and therefore he fears for himself that he will fall into their traps or vile schemes that aim to destroy him morally through conspiracies or fallacies that are told about the person seeing the dreamer to put him in an unfavorable image in front of people. Do not forget that the identity card or national number contains On the most important data, and therefore its loss or loss is a symbol of the disclosure of personal secrets. Seeing the loss of the card in a dream suggests that the dreamer should beware of those close to him, because among them are those who are jealous and hateful, and there are those who want to harm you. Whoever sees that the national card is lost and has not been Finding it indicates a lack of success in the subject of study and the difficulty of finding a suitable job or a decent job. Losing an identity in a dream indicates a bad relationship and disagreements with friends. title: Interpretation of jealousy in a dream: Seeing jealousy in a dream

Whoever sees that he is jealous is keen, and whoever sees that he is jealous about something, then he is interested in worldly matters. title: Interpretation of a dream about building a house according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: To see building a house in a dream shows goodness and joy, and other interpretations, we will interpret it for a single girl, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, for men, as building a new house or building. A room, or I dreamed that I was building my house, or I saw two builders from Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, and more interpretations in a topic continued below: Interpretation of building a house in a dream Seeing building a house in a dream Evidence of changing the situation for the better for the one who sees it Arab scholars and dream interpreters say that the vision varies It varies from person to person and varies according to time and place. Whoever sees that he has built or is building a new house in a dream in a place he knows or on land he owns, this indicates that he will achieve goodness in his world and seek something from the world, so he must be careful not to violate the forbidden in his endeavor. It is said that That a man builds or builds a new house, raises him to a rank among his people, and brings together his family and friends and everyone he knows to goodness and happiness, or he finds goodness in life and living, and a woman of good religion and morals.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format ' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Whoever is seen building a new home while he is unmarried and unmarried, whether he is an unmarried young man, an unmarried virgin, or an unmarried divorced woman, this indicates marriage. And to live in the same way as the house and its beauty. As for mentioning the method of construction and the materials he uses in building his house, if he builds or constructs his new house with bricks, clay, or similar materials, then he will have legitimate money and live with legitimate money. Muhrim, and increases his sanctity, so he raises himself in the building, increases his building, and warns him of fire. Completing construction, and whoever sees his new house made of gold, indicates the outbreak of fire in his house, and whoever leaves a narrow house will escape from worries, sorrows, poverty, and diseases. And whoever sees that he is building a house from the beginning by digging the foundation until it is completely built, this indicates that he will get what he asks for. Whoever seeks livelihood, knowledge, craft, trade, or need, and whoever seeks it. He builds a building in a village, city, or place he knows outside his city, and then marries a woman from there. If it is built of clay, this indicates the person's hypocrisy and hypocrisy. As for clay and bricks, they indicate legitimate money, and as for many inscriptions, decorations, and ostentation in their form, they indicate amusement in the world, carelessness, and joy.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' ' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about chocolate on the body in a dream. If you want to know the interpretation of dreaming about chocolate on the body in a dream, it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of the dream and whether it is a sign of good or evil in order to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate On the body in a dream: The presence of chocolate on the body in a dream can be an indication of the good things that come to the dreamer’s life in those days, thanks to God. Anyone who sees in a dream that chocolate was on a person’s body can indicate the blessings and good things that are present in the dreamer’s life, And God knows best. Seeing chocolate on the body in a dream could indicate happy news coming to him at that time, and God knows best. In the case of a person, the chocolate was in his body could be an indication of the positive changes that were occurring in his life during this period, and God knows best. I know. It is possible that seeing chocolate stolen in a dream indicates distance from the material obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this period. Seeing chocolate stolen in a dream and eating it may indicate the dreamer’s illegal gains and he must repent to God Almighty. We may find that distributing chocolate in a dream is evidence of kindness and the ability to fulfill desires and dreams, thanks to God. If one sees coconut chocolate India and eating it, this may indicate the end of worries and sorrows from the life of the dreamer at that time, thanks to God.
